question: 究極
sourceMnemonic: You are trying to <kanji>research</kanji> the <kanji>extreme</kanji>s. If you do that, you'll be able to figure out the <vocabulary>ultimate</vocabulary> weapon. Just researching the safe middle-ground stuff won't get you ultimate. Extreme research, however, will.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
